TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RichTextBoxLanguageOptions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Provides settings for Input Method Editor (IME) and Asian language support.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxLanguageOptions AutoFont = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the control automatically changes fonts when the user explicitly changes to a different keyboard layout.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxLanguageOptions AutoFontSizeAdjust = int32(16)

Docs.summary: Specifies that font-bound font sizes are scaled from the insertion point size according to a script. For example, Asian fonts are slightly larger than Western fonts. This is the default.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxLanguageOptions AutoKeyboard = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the control automatically changes the keyboard layout when the user explicitly changes to a different font, or when the user explicitly changes the insertion point to a new location in the text.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxLanguageOptions DualFont = int32(128)

Docs.summary: Sets the control to dual-font mode. Used for Asian language text. The control uses an English font for ASCII text and an Asian font for Asian text.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxLanguageOptions ImeAlwaysSendNotify = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Specifies how the client is notified during IME composition. A setting of 0 specifies that no EN_CHANGE or EN_SELCHANGE events occur during an undetermined state. Notification is sent when the final string comes in. This is the default. A setting of 1 specifies that EN_CHANGE and EN_SELCHANGE events occur during an undetermined state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxLanguageOptions ImeCancelComplete = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Specifies how the control uses the composition string of an Input Method Editor (IME) if the user cancels it. If this flag is set, the control discards the composition string. If this flag is not set, the control uses the composition string as the result string.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxLanguageOptions UIFonts = int32(32)

Docs.summary: Specifies that user-interface default fonts be used. This option is turned off by default.
